proposal: Understanding the need for scalability and speed within the Ethereum ecosystem, Impulse Network is paving the way with its Layer 2 solutions. Congrats on reaching 245 holders on the ETH network! 🎉 If you're looking to further engage your community, why not let them deploy their own DEX or run a blockchain lottery? Our tools are designed to align with visions like yours, empowering communities beyond just transactions.
